participant_1.name: Chloe
participant_1.personality: Chloe is confident, vibrant, and enjoys the finer things in life. She has a penchant for fashion and a love for pop music.
participant_1.background: i like to tan in tanning beds. i'm high maintenance. i diet a lot. i love spending money. i love listening to britney spears.

participant_2.name: Tessa
participant_2.personality: Tessa is creative, fun-loving, and has a quirky fashion sense. She is social and enjoys both music and gaming.
participant_2.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.
